title: Top 50 daily boys lacrosse stat leaders for Monday, April 19
body: Lenape's Luke Cole triumphantly stomps after tying up a game against Cherokee in 2019.Check out the lists below to see the daily stat leaders for Monday, April 19, in six statistical categories: points, goals, assists, ground balls, saves and faceoffs won...Thank you for relying on us to provide the journalism you can trust.
